mapper.select: /* sql : LoginRepository.findByLoginId */ SELECT A.USER_ID, A.LOGIN_ID, A.USER_NM, A.USER_PW, A.TEL_NO, A.USE_YN, A.PW_FAIL_CNT, A.LAST_LOGIN_DT FROM TB_USER A WHERE A.LOGIN_ID = #{login_id}
mapper.insert: /* sql : LoginRepository.saveToken */ INSERT INTO TB_LOGIN (ACCESS_TOKEN, REFRESH_TOKEN, UPDATED_AT, LOGIN_ID) VALUES (#{access_token}, #{refresh_token}, NOW(), #{login_id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ACCESS_TOKEN = #{access_token}, REFRESH_TOKEN = #{refresh_token}, UPDATED_AT = NOW()
mapper.select: /* sql : LoginRepository.findByLoginId */ SELECT LOGIN_ID, ACCESS_TOKEN, REFRESH_TOKEN, UPDATED_AT FROM TB_LOGIN WHERE ACCESS_TOKEN = #{access_token}
